    • Uses of MessagingConfigurer in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder

      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder with parameters of type MessagingConfigurer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessagingBuilder MessagingBuilder.register(MessagingConfigurer configurer, int priority)
      Registers a configurer with a priority.

    • Uses of MessagingConfigurer in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.configurer

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.configurer that implement MessagingConfigurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultMessagingConfigurer
      Default configurer that is automatically applied every time a MessagingBuilder instance is created through MessagingBuilder.standard() or MessagingBuilder.minimal().
      class  MessagingConfigurerAdapter
      Adapter that configures a MessagingBuilder instance.

    • Uses of MessagingConfigurer in fr.sii.ogham.email.builder.javamail

      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Default JavaMail configurer that is automatically applied every time a MessagingBuilder instance is created through MessagingBuilder.standard().

    • Uses of MessagingConfigurer in fr.sii.ogham.sms.builder.ovh

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.sms.builder.ovh that implement MessagingConfigurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultOvhSmsConfigurer
      Default configurer that configures sending of SMS through OVH HTTP API .The configurer is automatically applied every time a MessagingBuilder instance is created through MessagingBuilder.standard().

    • Uses of MessagingConfigurer in fr.sii.ogham.spring.common

      Subinterfaces of MessagingConfigurer in fr.sii.ogham.spring.common

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.spring.common that implement MessagingConfigurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SpringEnvironmentConfigurer
      Configures general environment (and may be inherited) to use Spring Environment instead of basic Java Properties object.

    • Uses of MessagingConfigurer in fr.sii.ogham.spring.email

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.spring.email that implement MessagingConfigurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SpringMailConfigurer
      Integrates with Spring Mail by using Spring properties defined with prefix spring.mail (see MailProperties).
      class  SpringSendGridConfigurer
      Integrates with Spring SendGrid by using Spring properties defined with prefix spring.sendgrid (see SendGridProperties).

    • Uses of MessagingConfigurer in fr.sii.ogham.spring.sms

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.spring.sms that implement MessagingConfigurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SpringCloudhopperConfigurer
      This configurer is also to support property naming variants (see RelaxedNames).
      class  SpringOvhSmsConfigurer
      This configurer is useful to support property naming variants (see RelaxedNames).

    • Uses of MessagingConfigurer in fr.sii.ogham.spring.template

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.spring.template that implement MessagingConfigurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FreeMarkerConfigurer
      Integrates with Spring templating system by using Freemarker Configuration object provided by Spring and by using Spring properties defined with prefix spring.freemarker (see FreeMarkerProperties).
      class  NoTemplateEngineConfigurer 
      class  ThymeLeafConfigurer
      Integrates with Spring templating system by using SpringTemplateEngine object provided by Spring and by using Spring properties defined with prefix spring.thymeleaf (see ThymeleafProperties).

    • Uses of MessagingConfigurer in fr.sii.ogham.template.freemarker.configurer

      Classes in fr.sii.ogham.template.freemarker.configurer that implement MessagingConfigurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultFreemarkerEmailConfigurer
      Default configurer for Freemarker template engine that is automatically applied every time a MessagingBuilder instance is created through MessagingBuilder.standard() or MessagingBuilder.minimal().
      class  DefaultFreemarkerSmsConfigurer
      Default configurer for Freemarker template engine that is automatically applied every time a MessagingBuilder instance is created through MessagingBuilder.standard() or MessagingBuilder.minimal().
